module.header:
<style>

.bstrap30 .form-control[disabled], .bstrap30 .form-control[readonly], fieldset[disabled] .bstrap30 .form-control {
    background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;
    border: none!important;
    padding: 6px 3px!important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none!important;
    box-shadow: none!important;
}


.bstrap30 .btn-default:hover {
   background-color: #fff!important;
}

.bstrap30 .btn-default:focus{
   background-color: #fff!important;
}

.bstrap30 .col-sm-1 {
    text-align: right;
    padding-top: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
}


</style>
